item.title: [GCO系列-番外01] ClusterNet
item.description: Motivation Related Work ClusterNet Forward Pass Backward Pass A Visual Proof Solving the Optimization Problems Experimental Results Conclusion Wilder et al., End to End Learning and Optimization on Graphs. NeurIPS'2019. 这篇是我在遍历Graph Combinatorial Optimization相关工作过程中发现的一篇pap
